name: Validate presence of loading markers during response generation - Loading states and fallback messages
description:
**Objective:**  
Ensure that appropriate loading indicators (e.g., 'Scanning', 'Analyzing documents', etc.) are shown while the AI is generating a response.

parameters.name: case
parameters.value: {'id': 'faq_visa_en', 'lang': 'en', 'user': 'How can I renew my UAE visa?', 'golden': 'You can renew your UAE residence visa through ICP or GDRFA portals. Check eligibility and submit biometrics if prompted.', 'threshold': 0.8, 'must_contain': ['ICP', 'GDRFA', 'biometric']}

labels.name: story
labels.value: Visual feedback should appear while response is being generated

labels.name: epic
labels.value: Loading markers appear while building the answer
